name: Gusto
description: Launched in 2012, Gusto empowers over 300,000 businesses nationwide, processing tens of billions in payroll annually. This all-in-one platform simplifies HR, benefits (including health insurance and 401(k)s), and payroll for SMBs. Their refreshingly easy system automates tasks and provides expert support, saving you time and reducing errors. Focus on your business, not paperwork.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Streamline your business and reclaim your time with Gusto's automated payroll, HR, and benefits tools
ShortDescription: Hire, pay, and manage your team all in one place.

Highlights.name: Simplify Your Workday
Highlights.description: Manage payroll, benefits, and HR tasks all in one place, saving you time and effort.

Highlights.name: Empower Your People
Highlights.description: Offer a user-friendly employee self-service portal for easy access to paystubs, benefits, and more.

Highlights.name: Focus on What Matters
Highlights.description: Gusto's team of HR experts ensures you stay compliant with regulations, allowing you to focus on growing your business.

enhanced_description: Gusto, launched in 2012, is an all-in-one cloud-based platform designed to simplify HR, benefits, and payroll for Small and Medium Businesses (SMBs). Empowering over 300,000 businesses nationwide and processing tens of billions in payroll annually, Gusto offers a refreshingly easy system that automates tasks and provides expert support. The platform streamlines operations, enabling businesses to hire, pay, and manage their team all in one place. It includes comprehensive employee benefits management, such as health insurance and 401(k)s, and offers a user-friendly employee self-service portal for easy access to paystubs and benefits. Gusto's team of HR experts assists businesses in staying compliant with regulations, saving time, reducing errors, and allowing them to focus on core business growth.
key_use_cases: General HR management and task automation
Employee self-service for paystubs and benefits access
Compliance management for HR and payroll regulations
competitive_advantages: All-in-one integrated platform for HR, payroll, and benefits
Automation of routine HR and payroll tasks
Expert HR support and compliance assistance
Time and error reduction for businesses
roi_benefits: Time savings in HR, payroll, and benefits management
Enhanced focus on core business activities and growth
Faster and more efficient talent acquisition
Assurance of compliance with HR and payroll regulations
compliance_features: Assistance with HR and payroll regulatory compliance
scalability_features: Designed to support growing small and medium businesses
Capable of processing high volumes of payroll for a large customer base
